name: Mysteries of Life
description:
This is a spot the difference/find the difference game, called Mysteries of Life. You will be shown two pictures side by side. The pictures may look similar at a glance, but if you look closely, you will find that there are 5 differences between the two. Try to find all of the differences without resorting to using hints.

Compare two images and spot five differences between them. Improve attention skills and exercise brain while playing this completely FREE arcade game.

Standard, Timed and Longplay games with specific or random images.

*7 themes

*5 different pictures per themes.

High quality images, works equally great on phones and tablets!

Themes in the game are:

*Steampunk

*Garages

*Jungle

*Underwater

*Tibet

*Ships

*Tanks

Play with our other games too:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=White+Rabbit+Games

Spot / Find the difference!
